name: Team 10 - Killing An Ant With A Nuke
name_original: Team 10 - Killing An Ant With A Nuke
description:
Its Mario but its 3D! This was actually quiet tricky to make in Unreal engine and our team faced many challenges throughout the week, but we are very happy and proud of the final project.

Credit :

Unreal tutorial: 

Assets: Most assets are actual images from Mario its self but imported into Photoshop to make texture maps for them.

Sounds: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1_CvFt25vb4_cLicdA9zHMVIFKYMEwe6u/view

Everything else is is from Unreal Engine which they allow people to use for free!
